changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE feature_flags ( id BIGSERIAL PRIMARY KEY, key VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL UNIQUE, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, tag VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, description TEXT, value BOOLEAN NOT NULL, is_active BOOLEAN NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP );
